Source

connection/connection.js

const EventEmitter = require('events');
const { v4: uuidv4 } = require('uuid');
const ConversationSubscription = require("../conversation/conversation-subscription");
const RoutingTaskSubscription = require("../agent-matching/routing-task-subscription");
const WebhooksIntake = require("../conversation/webhooks-intake");
const Conversation = require("../conversation/conversation");
const ConversationState = require('../conversation/conversation-state');
const ConnectionState = require('./connection-state');
const UserType = require('./user-type');
const ConnectionType = require('./connection-type');
const {PublishEventType} = require("../api/ws/messaging/publish-event");
const {WsApiVersion} = require('../api/ws');
const defaultConversationsCacheDuration = 1000 * 60 * 10; // 10 minutes

/**
 * Represents a connection to UMS.
 * @category Connection
 * @property {string} connectionId - A unique local id for this connection.
 * @property {ConnectionState} state - The current state of this connection
 * @property {User} user - an object that holds information on the current user, will be null until connection
 */
class Connection extends EventEmitter {

    static get ConnectionState() {
        return ConnectionState;
    }

    /**
     * A factory method that returns an appropriate connection object based on parameters.
     * Script must then call .open() to establish connection.
     * @static
     * @param {Object} args
     * @param {string} args.accountId - the brand's accountId
     * @param {ConnectionType} [args.connectionType=WEBSOCKET] - Specifies the mode of transport: WEBSOCKET, REST, or SEND_API
     * @param {UserType} args.userType - The type of user this connection will be used for: BRAND or CONSUMER
     * @param {Object} [args.authData=null] - Required if this is an agent or authenticated consumer
     * @param {Object} [args.clientProperties=null] - Connection metadata for consumer connections
     * @param {boolean} [args.maintainConnection=true] - If true, the SDK will always attempt to reconnect
     * @param {boolean} [args.createDefaultSubscription=true] - If true, the connection will subscribe to receive conversations matching the defaultSubscriptionQuery below
     * @param {Object} [args.defaultSubscriptionQuery=null] - Defaults to stage:["OPEN"] for brand connections and stage:["OPEN", "CLOSE"] for consumer connections. May be overridden
     * @param {boolean} [args.waitForFirstNotification] - If true, the default subscription will wait for the first notification from UMS
     * @param {boolean} [args.getAllMessages] - If true, new conversations will have all messages populated for the active dialog
     * @param {string} [args.appId] - Optional application identifier for clients consuming the sdk.
     * @param {string} [args.appVersion] - Optional application version for clients consuming the sdk
     * @param {boolean} [args.limitBreakEnabled] determines whether or not the 1001 conversation subscription limit break is active
     * @returns {Connection} - A connection object of the appropriate type, ready for connection
     * @example
     * const connection = Connection.createConnection({
     *   accountId:'12345678',
     *   userType: lpm.UserType.CONSUMER
     * });
     * await connection.open();
     * @example
     * const connection = Connection.createConnection({
     *   accountId: '12345678',
     *   userType: lpm.UserType.BRAND,
     *   authData: {
     *     username: 'agent001@liveperson.com',
     *     password: 'password123'
     *   }
     * });
     * await connection.open();
     */
    static createConnection(
        {
            userType,
            connectionType = ConnectionType.WEBSOCKET,
            accountId = '',
            authData,
            clientProperties = null,
            maintainConnection = true,
            createDefaultSubscription = true,
            defaultSubscriptionQuery = null,
            waitForFirstNotification = false,
            pollShiftStatus = false,
            token = null,
            unauthConnectorId = null,
            getAllMessages = false,
            appId = null,
            appVersion= null,
            limitBreakEnabled = null
        }) {

        if (accountId === null || accountId.length === 0) {
            throw new Error('accountId is a required parameter');
        }

        if (connectionType === ConnectionType.NULL) {
            const NullConnection = require('./connection-null');
            return new NullConnection({
                accountId
            });
        }

        if (userType === UserType.BRAND) {
            if (connectionType === ConnectionType.WEBSOCKET) {
                const BrandWebsocketConnection = require('./connection-websocket-brand');
                return new BrandWebsocketConnection(
                    {
                        accountId,
                        authData,
                        maintainConnection,
                        createDefaultSubscription,
                        defaultSubscriptionQuery,
                        waitForFirstNotification,
                        pollShiftStatus,
                        getAllMessages,
                        appId,
                        appVersion,
                        limitBreakEnabled: limitBreakEnabled || true
                    });
            }

            else if (connectionType === ConnectionType.REST) {
                const BrandRestConnection = require('./connection-rest-brand');
                return new BrandRestConnection(
                    {
                        accountId,
                        authData,
                        token,
                        appId,
                        appVersion
                    });
            }

            else {
                throw new Error(`Unsupported connectionType: ${connectionType}`);
            }
        }
        else if (userType === UserType.CONSUMER) {
            if (connectionType === ConnectionType.WEBSOCKET) {
                const ConsumerWebsocketConnection = require('./connection-websocket-consumer');
                return new ConsumerWebsocketConnection(
                    {
                        accountId,
                        authData,
                        clientProperties,
                        maintainConnection,
                        createDefaultSubscription,
                        defaultSubscriptionQuery,
                        waitForFirstNotification,
                        token,
                        unauthConnectorId,
                        appId,
                        appVersion,
                        limitBreakEnabled: limitBreakEnabled || false // consumers should never need this
                    });
            }
            else {
                throw new Error(`Unsupported connectionType: ${connectionType}`);
            }
        }
        else {
            throw new Error(`Invalid userType: ${userType}`);
        }
    }

    constructor(a) {
        super();

        if (!a.hasOwnProperty('accountId')) throw new Error(`accountId is required to create a connection`);
        this.accountId = a.accountId;

        this._limitBreakEnabled = a.limitBreakEnabled || true;

        // assign each connection a unique id
        this.connectionId = uuidv4();

        this.state = ConnectionState.INITIAL;

        // keep track of all active conversations:
        // 1. Any conversation successfully created by this connection, but not yet received notification
        // 2. Any conversation known from a subscription notification, but not yet received delete on that subscription
        // 3. Conversations with overlapping subscriptions - must receive delete on all subs to remove from this list
        this._conversations = new Map();

        // how long to keep a conversation in cache after it is no longer used
        // allows an override, otherwise defaults to 10 minutes
        this._conversationsCacheDuration = ("conversationsCacheDuration" in a) ? a["conversationsCacheDuration"] : defaultConversationsCacheDuration;

        // keep track of conversation subscriptions
        this._conversationSubscriptions = new Map();

        // keep track of routing task subscriptions
        this._routingTaskSubscriptions = new Map();

        // just in case we want in ingest webhooks,, this will be created on first use
        this._webhooksIntake = null;

        // keep track of skills
        this._skills = new Map();

        if (this.api !== null) {
            // setup the conversation notification handler
            this.on(this.api.notificationTypes.ExConversationChangeNotification, msg => {
                this._onExConversationNotification(msg.body);
            });

            // setup the messaging notification handler
            this.on(this.api.notificationTypes.MessagingEventNotification, msg => {
                this._onMessagingEventNotification(msg.body);
            });

            // setup the routing task notification handler
            this.on(this.api.notificationTypes.RoutingTaskNotification, msg => {
                this._onRoutingTaskNotification(msg.body);
            });
        }

        // prevent errors from causing crashes, SDK is not required to see them
        this.on('error', err => {});
    }

    /**
     * Establishes or initializes a connection to UMS
     *
     * @abstract
     * @async
     */
    async open() {}

    get api() {
        return null;
    }

    /**
     * Start the closing process
     * @returns void
     */
    async close() {

        if (this.state === ConnectionState.INITIAL) {
            throw new Error(`cannot close connection, connection has never been opened`);
        }

        if (this.state === ConnectionState.CONNECTING) {
            throw new Error(`cannot close connection, connection is still trying to connect`);
        }

        if (this.state === ConnectionState.CLOSED) {
            throw new Error(`cannot close connection, connection has already been closed`);
        }

        if (this.state === ConnectionState.CLOSING) {
            throw new Error(`cannot close connection, connection is already closing`);
        }

        // state must eventually be set to closed via the websocket closed (or something else for REST)
        this.state = ConnectionState.CLOSING;
    }

    /**
     * Returns the token from this connection
     * @async
     * @abstract
     * @returns {Promise<string>} Token
     */
    async getToken() {
        throw new Error('getToken is not implemented');
    }

    /**
     * Creates a conversation subscription in UMS based on the input criteria.
     *
     * @async
     * @param {object} args
     * @param {boolean} [args.waitForFirstNotification] - If true, wait for the first notification after this request is sent
     * @param {object} [args.query]
     * @param {string} [args.query.accountId]
     * @param {string} [args.query.agentId]
     * @param {string} [args.query.consumerId]
     * @param {string} [args.query.conversationId]
     * @param {string} [args.query.state]
     * @param {string} [args.query.stage]
     * @param {DialogType} [args.query.dialogType]
     * @returns {Promise<ConversationSubscription>}
     */
    async createConversationSubscription({query, waitForFirstNotification = false} = {}) {

        // create the subscription object
        const subscription = new ConversationSubscription(this, query);

        // then initialize it
        await subscription.init(waitForFirstNotification);

        // return the subscription object
        return subscription;
    }

    /**
     * Makes a request to UMS to create a subscription, must be implemented at the transport layer
     *
     * @async
     * @abstract
     * @returns {Promise<uuid>} subscriptionId of the created subscription
     * @protected
     */
    async _requestConversationSubscription(query) {
        throw new Error("_requestConversationSubscription not implemented");
    }

    /**
     * Processes a notification received through a webhook request.
     * This should not be used in combination with conversation subscriptions
     * @param notification The notification received through webhooks
     */
    async processWebhooksNotification(notification) {
        if (this._webhooksIntake === null) {
            this._webhooksIntake = new WebhooksIntake(this);
            await this._webhooksIntake.init();
        }
        await this._webhooksIntake.onNotification(notification);
    }

    /**
     * Emits any notifications as an event whose name is the notification's type
     *
     * @param {object} msg - the parsed message received from UMS
     * @param {string} msg.type - the type of notification, see API.notificationTypes
     * @private
     */
    _handleNotification(msg) {
        // TODO transform the type to some local enum values, removing the v2 vs v3
        this.emit(msg.type, msg);
    }

    /**
     * Process conversation notifications.
     * @param {object} body - notifications from UMS
     * @private
     */
    _onExConversationNotification(body) {

        //console.debug('--- connection.conversationNotification\n' + JSON.stringify(body, null, 2));

        // now give the event to the specific conversation
        const subscriptionId = body.subscriptionId;

        // emit an error if we've received a notification without a subscription
        if (!(this._conversationSubscriptions.has(subscriptionId))) {
            // TODO comment this out for production
            this.emit('error', new Error(`invalid subscriptionId ${subscriptionId}`));
            return;
        }

        const subscription = this._conversationSubscriptions.get(subscriptionId);

        // Perform transformation on raw notifications
        body.changes.forEach(conversation => {
            const conversationDetails = conversation.result.conversationDetails;

            //   Make a lookup if this is v2
            if (this.api.version === WsApiVersion.V2) {
                const participantsLookupTable = this._createParticipantsLookupTable(conversationDetails.participants, conversationDetails.participantsPId);
                //   Loop through All dialogs and participants, assign userId and agentId
                this._addDialogStateFields(conversationDetails.dialogs, participantsLookupTable);
            }

            else {
                // if v3, add fields without using lookup
                this._addDialogStateFields(conversationDetails.dialogs, null);
            }
        })

        subscription.onNotification(body);

        // give the raw event to anybody that wants it
        this.emit('conversationNotification', body);
    }

    /**
     * Called just before a subscription emits a previously unseen conversation
     * @protected
     */
    async _onConversation(conversation) {}

    /**
     * Takes an MS notification and sends it to the appropriate eventType handler
     * @param body
     * @private
     */
    _onMessagingEventNotification(body) {
        //console.debug('--- connection.messageNotification\n' + JSON.stringify(body, null, 2));

        if (body.changes) {
            body.changes.forEach(message => {
                this._processMessageNotification(message);
            });
        }
        else {
            this._processMessageNotification(body);
        }

        this.emit('messageNotification', body);

    }

    _processMessageNotification(message) {
        let conversationId = null;

        if (message.originatorPId) {
            // v2 notification
            message.originatorUserId = message.originatorPId;
            message.originatorAgentId = message.originatorId;
        }

        else {
            // v3 notification
            message.originatorUserId = message.originatorId;
            message.originatorAgentId = null;
        }

        if (message.conversationId) {
            conversationId = message.conversationId;
        }

        else {
            // the conversationId is not a part of the MS notifications resulting from _subscribeMessagingEvents
            // this is still valid so we need to look it up by dialogId
            conversationId = this._findConversationIdByDialogId(message.dialogId);
        }

        // if this conversation isn't in the conversation list yet, what to do?
        if (conversationId === null || !(this._conversations.has(conversationId))) {
            if (message.event.type === PublishEventType.ACCEPT_STATUS_EVENT || message.event.type === PublishEventType.CHAT_STATE_EVENT) {
                // TODO handle this or continue to ignore
            }

            else {
                this.emit('error', new Error(`${message.event.type} received for conversation not in cache, conversationId: ${conversationId}, accountId: ${this.accountId}`));
                return;
            }
            // this could be caused by the 1001 limit, check for 'max number of changes received in notification for accountId' log
            return;
        }

        // give the message to the conversation
        const conversation = this._conversations.get(conversationId);
        conversation._onMessageNotification(message);
    }

    _emitError(err) {
        this.emit('error', err);
    }

    _removeConversationFromCache(conversationId) {
        this._conversations.delete(conversationId);
    }

    _findConversationIdByDialogId(dialogId) {

        for (const [conversationId, conversation] of this._conversations.entries()) {
            if (dialogId in conversation._dialogsById) {
                return conversationId;
            }
        }

        return null;
    }

    /**
     * Makes a request to UMS for a new conversation.
     * Constructs a conversation object with the response information.
     *
     * @async
     * @param {object} args
     * @param {string} [args.skillId] - creates this conversation in the specified skillId
     * @param {object} [args.context] - this data will be passed back in the notifications as conversationDetails.context
     * @param {object} [args.campaignInfo] - Contains the campaignId and engagementId
     * @param {string} [args.campaignInfo.campaignId] - The campaignId retrieved by the Engagement Monitoring API endpoint
     * @param {string} [args.campaignInfo.engagementId] - The engagementId retrieved by the Engagement Monitoring API endpoint
     * @returns {Promise<Conversation>}
     */
    async createConversation({skillId = null, context = null, campaignInfo = null} = {}) {

        // create context if required
        if (context === null) {
            // default to empty, a type will be assigned later
            context = {};
        }

        // attach clientProperties from connection if not already present
        if (!context.clientProperties) {
            context.clientProperties = this.clientProperties;
        }

        // ask UMS to make a conversation and store the resulting conversationId
        const conversationId = await this._consumerRequestConversation({skillId, context, campaignInfo});

        // create the object and initialize the conversation
        const conversation = new Conversation({conversationId, connection: this});

        conversation.stage = ConversationState.OPEN;

        // store in the active conversations
        this._conversations.set(conversation.conversationId, conversation);

        return conversation;
    }

    /**
     * Makes a request to UMS to create a conversation, only supported by ConsumerWebsocketConnection
     *
     * @async
     * @abstract
     * @returns {Promise<uuid>} conversationId of the created conversation
     * @protected
     */
    async _consumerRequestConversation({skillId, context}) {
        throw new Error("_consumerRequestConversation is only supported by ConsumerWebsocketConnection");
    }

    async _transferConversation(transferDetails) {
        throw new Error("_transferConversation not implemented");
    }

    async _sendNote(conversationId, note) {
        throw new Error("_sendNote not implemented");
    }

    async _sendCsat(conversationId, csatRate) {
        throw new Error("_sendCsat not implemented");
    }

    async _consumerTakeoverConversation(takeoverDetails) {
        throw new Error("_consumerTakeoverConversation not implemented");
    }

    /**
     * Changes the availability of an agent, only supported by BrandWebsocketConnection
     *
     * @async
     * @abstract
     * @param {string} agentId - {accountId.userId}. Defaults to the agentId for the current connection
     * @param {string} agentState - represents availability states of the agent: ONLINE, OFFLINE, AWAY, BACK_SOON
     * @returns void
     */
    async setAgentState({agentId, agentState}) {
        throw new Error("setAgentState not implemented");
    }

    /**
     * Allows user to set certain fields that get returned from getUserProfile
     *
     * Note: SDEs can only be set through authenticated user flow and do not use this function
     * @param body
     * @param {string} body.firstName
     * @param {string} body.lastName
     * @param {string} body.nickName
     * @returns {Promise<void>}
     */
    async setUserProfile(body) {
        throw new Error("setUserProfile not implemented");
    }

    _createParticipantsLookupTable(participants, participantsPId) {
        const participantsLookupTable = {};
        for (const [role, ids] of Object.entries(participants)) {
            // TODO handle edge cases? the order is different or if role doesn't exist
            let i = 0;
            ids.forEach(agentId => {
                if (role === 'CONSUMER' || participantsLookupTable.hasOwnProperty(agentId)) {
                    // TODO what to do?
                }
                else {
                    participantsLookupTable[agentId] = participantsPId[role][i];
                }
                i++
            })
        }

        return participantsLookupTable;
    }

    _addDialogStateFields(dialogs, participantsLookupTable) {
        // Loop through ALL dialogs
        dialogs.forEach(dialog => {

            // Loop through ALL participants
            dialog.participantsDetails.forEach(dialogParticipant => {
                // agent in v2 only
                //  "participantsDetails": [
                //     {
                //       "id": "79457930.3853585732",
                //       "role": "MANAGER",
                //       "state": "ACTIVE"
                //     }
                //   ]
                if (participantsLookupTable !== null && participantsLookupTable.hasOwnProperty(dialogParticipant.id)) {
                    dialogParticipant.userId = participantsLookupTable[dialogParticipant.id];
                    dialogParticipant.agentId = dialogParticipant.id;
                }
                // consumer in v2, or any participants in v3
                else {
                    dialogParticipant.userId = dialogParticipant.id;
                    dialogParticipant.agentId = null;
                }
            })
        })
    }

    /**
     * Makes the websocket call to Agent Matching to subscribe for rings.
     * @protected
     * @abstract
     * @param accountId
     * @param agentId
     */
    async _subscribeRoutingTasks(accountId, agentId) {
        throw new Error('_subscribeRoutingTasks not implemented');
    }

    /**
     * Updates the state of a ring. If state is accepted, the agent will be assigned to the conversation.
     * @protected
     * @abstract
     * @param ringId
     * @param ringState
     */
    async _updateRingState(ringId, ringState) {
        throw new Error('_updateRingState not implemented');
    }

    /**
     * Creates a routing task subscription in UMS based on the input criteria.
     *
     * @async
     * @param {object} args
     * @param {object} [args.query] - Optional query
     * @param {string} [args.query.accountId] - Optional accountId(default to connection.accountId)
     * @param {string} [args.query.agentId] - Optional agentId(defaults to connection.agentId)
     * @returns {Promise<RoutingTaskSubscription>}
     */
    async createRoutingTaskSubscription({query = {}} = {}) {
        // create the subscription object
        const subscription = new RoutingTaskSubscription(this, query);

        // then initialize it
        await subscription.init();

        // return the subscription object
        return subscription;
    }

    /**
     * Process routing task notifications.
     * @param {object} body - notifications from UMS
     * @private
     */
    _onRoutingTaskNotification(body) {
        // now give the event to the specific conversation
        const subscriptionId = body.subscriptionId;

        // emit an error if we've received a notification without a subscription
        if (!(this._routingTaskSubscriptions.has(subscriptionId))) {
            // TODO comment this out for production
            this.emit('error', new Error(`invalid subscriptionId ${subscriptionId}`));
            return;
        }

        const subscription = this._routingTaskSubscriptions.get(subscriptionId);

        subscription.onNotification(body);

        // give the raw event to anybody that wants it
        this.emit('routingTaskNotification', body);
    }
}

module.exports = Connection;
